title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 24 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jun 24 2022
description:
After 50 years, the Supreme Court overturns Roe v. Wade and Casey, throws abortion back to the states, millions of future lives saved. Buck says, "Life wins." Trump has now had the most profound pro-life legacy of any American president in 50 years. The fight is not over, it moves to the states. President Biden addresses the nation on abortion. Buck says, "I do not have high hopes for Mr. Magoo to unify us." Biden focuses on rape and incest, which is 1% of abortions. Buck takes calls on the Roe. v. Wade ruling.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
